bibl.title: Proceedings of the International Congress Palestine in the Light of Papyri and Inscriptions, 5-9 September 1998. I
bibl.note: Cleopatra's expedition (103-101 B.C.) aimed at defending the throne of Egypt and defending it she did.
GAD M.E., The Expedition of Cleopatra III to Palestine.
Alia HANAFI (Ed.), Proceedings of the International Congress Palestine in the Light of Papyri and Inscriptions, 5-9 September 1998. I (Cairo, 2000) pp. 39-60.
